body:
NOTE: This is an anime/manga related topic and for people who are interested in anime/manga only
so if you're not interested in the topic then you are welcome to ignore this and please dont start any random hate comments

One of my favorite manga's of all time is coming to an end, after reading this for almost 2 years, the last volume is coming to a close and will be revealing the promise girl, the confessions, and whom does Raku (Main Character) end up with...

Manga: (Latest Chapter) http://mangafox.me/manga/nisekoi/vTBD/c226/1.html
Anime: (Season 1) http://kissanime.to/Anime/Nisekoi
                  (Season 2) http://kissanime.to/Anime/Nisekoi-2
                  (OVAs) http://kissanime.to/Anime/Nisekoi-OVA

Its come down to the last 2 heroines, Onodera and Chitoge! Who are you going with?
#TeamOnodera or #TeamChitoge ?

I've been going for Team Onodera since day 1 and i've already read the latest chapters. now i want you to comment down below your opinion or who do you think will end up with raku!

No Spoilers will be said here, as well as in the comments down below until the manga actually comes to an end!

Haven't seen the anime nor manga? i'd recommend into watching and reading them if you're into that kind of stuff ! :)

- Toby/Speeded

title: NISEKOI! | Manga is coming to an end

replies.body: ohmy i really am going to miss this so much
